sentence.Network_en: She turned around and began to retrace her steps towards the house.
sentence.Network_cn: 她转身沿原路向那栋房子走去。

sentence.Network_en: You might find your ticket if you retrace your steps back to the car.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果原路折回到车子那里,就有可能寻回你的票.

sentence.Network_en: You must retrace your steps [ way ] .
sentence.Network_cn: 你必须 折回 原来 走过 的路;你必须重来一次.

entry.def: If you retrace your steps or retrace your way, you return to the place you started from by going back along the same route.

example.ex: He retraced his steps to the spot where he'd left the case.
example.tran: 他折回到他丢下箱子的地方。

sentences.sentence: "we retraced the route we took last summer"

auth_sentence.content: Think of the retrace time on an oscilloscope.
auth_sentence.res_content: Think of the retrace time on an oscilloscope.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Think of the retrace time on an oscilloscope.

auth_sentence.content: The alley simply terminated...He had to retrace his steps.
auth_sentence.res_content: The alley simply terminated...He had to retrace his steps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The alley simply terminated...He had to retrace his steps.

auth_sentence.content: Occidental is happy to oblige visitors who want to retrace his steps.
auth_sentence.res_content: Occidental is happy to oblige visitors who want to retrace his steps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Occidental is happy to oblige visitors who want to retrace his steps.

sentences.en: We retraced our route in an attempt to get back on the right path.
sentences.cn: 我们折返，想回到正确的路上。

sentences.en: You might find your ticket if you retrace your steps back to the car.
sentences.cn: 如果原路折回到车子那里 ，就有可能寻回你的票。
